properties.description: This is the advice dimension for NSIP

source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_nsip_advice_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_nsip_advice_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_advice_dim_new 
AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.advicenodeid IS NULL
        THEN T3.NSIPAdviceID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                         AS NSIPAdviceID,
    T1.advicenodeid                             AS AdviceNodeID,
    T1.title                                    AS AdviceTitle,
    T1.casereference                            AS CaseReference,
    T1.advicereference                          AS AdviceReference,
    T1.advicestatus                             AS AdviceStatus,
    T1.section51advice                          AS Section51Advice,
    T1.enquirerfirstname                        AS EnquirerFirstName,
    T1.enquirerlastname                         AS EnquirerLastName,
    T1.enquirerorganisation                     AS EnquirerOrganisation,
    T1.enquirydate                              AS EnquiryDate,
    T1.enqirymethod                             AS EnquiryMethod,
    T1.enquiry                                  AS Enquiry,
    T1.advicefrom                               AS AdviceFrom,
    T1.advicedate                               AS AdviceDate,
    T1.advice                                   AS Advice,
    T1.advicelastmodified                       AS AdviceLastModified,
    T1.attachmentcount                          AS AttachmentCount,
    IFNULL(T1.attachmentdataID,'None')          AS AttachmentID,
    T1.attachmentslastmodified                  AS AttachmentLastModified,
    T1.lastpublisheddate                        AS LastPublishedDate,
    T1.casenodeid                               AS CaseNodeID,
    T1.welshlanguage                            AS WelshLanguage,
    T1.caseWorktype                             AS CaseWorkType,
    T2.SourceSystemID                           AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)              AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.advicenodeid,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.advicereference,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.advicestatus,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.section51advice,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.enquirerfirstname,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.enquirerlastname,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.enquirerorganisation,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.enquirydate,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.enqirymethod,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.enquiry,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.advicefrom,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.advicedate,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.advice,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.advicelastmodified,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.attachmentcount,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.attachmentdataID,'None'),
        IFNULL(T1.attachmentslastmodified,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.lastpublisheddate,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.casenodeid,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.welshlanguage,'.'),	
        IFNULL(T1.caseWorktype,'.')))           AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y' AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive AS HistoricIsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_advice T1

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2   
    ON "Casework" = T2.Description      
        AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'

FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim T3 
    ON T1.advicenodeid = T3.AdviceNodeID AND 
        IFNULL(T1.attachmentdataID,'None') = T3.AttachmentID
        AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.advicenodeid = T3.AdviceNodeID AND IFNULL(T1.attachmentdataID,'None') = T3.AttachmentID
                AND  
                md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.advicenodeid,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.advicereference,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.advicestatus,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.section51advice,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.enquirerfirstname,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.enquirerlastname,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.enquirerorganisation,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.enquirydate,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.enqirymethod,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.enquiry,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.advicefrom,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.advicedate,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.advice,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.advicelastmodified,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.attachmentcount,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.attachmentdataID,'None'),
                IFNULL(T1.attachmentslastmodified,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.lastpublisheddate,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.casenodeid,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.welshlanguage,'.'),	
                IFNULL(T1.caseWorktype,'.')))
                <> T3.RowID  -- same row, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T3.AdviceNodeID IS NULL -- new AdviceNodeID
                THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) 
    AND T1.advicenodeid IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_advice)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_nsip_advice_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_nsip_advice_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_advice_dim_changed_rows
AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    NSIPAdviceID,
    AdviceNodeID,
    AdviceTitle,
    CaseReference,
    AdviceReference,
    AdviceStatus,
    Section51Advice,
    EnquirerFirstName,
    EnquirerLastName,
    EnquirerOrganisation,
    EnquiryDate,
    EnquiryMethod,
    Enquiry,
    AdviceFrom,
    AdviceDate,
    Advice,
    AdviceLastModified,
    AttachmentCount,
    AttachmentID,
    AttachmentLastModified,
    LastPublishedDate,
    CaseNodeID,
    WelshLanguage,
    CaseWorkType,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM casework_nsip_advice_dim_new 
WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' 
    OR HistoricIsActive IS NULL
UNION ALL
-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    NSIPAdviceID,
    AdviceNodeID,
    AdviceTitle,
    CaseReference,
    AdviceReference,
    AdviceStatus,
    Section51Advice,
    EnquirerFirstName,
    EnquirerLastName,
    EnquirerOrganisation,
    EnquiryDate,
    EnquiryMethod,
    Enquiry,
    AdviceFrom,
    AdviceDate,
    Advice,
    AdviceLastModified,
    AttachmentCount,
    AttachmentID,
    AttachmentLastModified,
    LastPublishedDate,
    CaseNodeID,
    WelshLanguage,
    CaseWorkType,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim T1
WHERE AdviceNodeID IN 
(
    SELECT AdviceNodeID 
    FROM casework_nsip_advice_dim_new 
    WHERE NSIPAdviceID IS NULL
) 
AND AttachmentID IN
(
    SELECT AttachmentID 
    FROM casework_nsip_advice_dim_new 
    WHERE AdviceNodeID = T1.AdviceNodeID
        AND NSIPAdviceID IS NULL
) 
AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_nsip_advice_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_advice_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    NSIPAdviceID,
    AdviceNodeID,
    AdviceTitle,
    CaseReference,
    AdviceReference,
    AdviceStatus,
    Section51Advice,
    EnquirerFirstName,
    EnquirerLastName,
    EnquirerOrganisation,
    EnquiryDate,
    EnquiryMethod,
    Enquiry,
    AdviceFrom,
    AdviceDate,
    Advice,
    AdviceLastModified,
    AttachmentCount,
    AttachmentID,
    AttachmentLastModified,
    LastPublishedDate,
    CaseNodeID,
    WelshLanguage,
    CaseWorkType,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_nsip_advice_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_nsip_advice_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. NSIPRelevantRepresentationID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim AS Target
USING casework_nsip_advice_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source
ON Source.NSIPAdviceID = Target.NSIPAdviceID AND Source.AttachmentID = Target.AttachmentID AND Target.IsActive = 'Y' 

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        NSIPAdviceID,
        AdviceNodeID,
        AdviceTitle,
        CaseReference,
        AdviceReference,
        AdviceStatus,
        Section51Advice,
        EnquirerFirstName,
        EnquirerLastName,
        EnquirerOrganisation,
        EnquiryDate,
        EnquiryMethod,
        Enquiry,
        AdviceFrom,
        AdviceDate,
        Advice,
        AdviceLastModified,
        AttachmentCount,
        AttachmentID,
        AttachmentLastModified,
        LastPublishedDate,
        CaseNodeID,
        WelshLanguage,
        CaseWorkType,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.NSIPAdviceID,
        Source.AdviceNodeID,
        Source.AdviceTitle,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.AdviceReference,
        Source.AdviceStatus,
        Source.Section51Advice,
        Source.EnquirerFirstName,
        Source.EnquirerLastName,
        Source.EnquirerOrganisation,
        Source.EnquiryDate,
        Source.EnquiryMethod,
        Source.Enquiry,
        Source.AdviceFrom,
        Source.AdviceDate,
        Source.Advice,
        Source.AdviceLastModified,
        Source.AttachmentCount,
        Source.AttachmentID,
        Source.AttachmentLastModified,
        Source.LastPublishedDate,
        Source.CaseNodeID,
        Source.WelshLanguage,
        Source.CaseWorkType,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_nsip_advice_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NSIPAdviceID NULLS LAST) AS NSIPAdviceID,
    AdviceNodeID,
    AdviceTitle,
    CaseReference,
    AdviceReference,
    AdviceStatus,
    Section51Advice,
    EnquirerFirstName,
    EnquirerLastName,
    EnquirerOrganisation,
    EnquiryDate,
    EnquiryMethod,
    Enquiry,
    AdviceFrom,
    AdviceDate,
    Advice,
    AdviceLastModified,
    AttachmentCount,
    AttachmentID,
    AttachmentLastModified,
    LastPublishedDate,
    CaseNodeID,
    WelshLanguage,
    CaseWorkType,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim;
